type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Item Cooldown

---



[Entity Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/item_cooldown).

Sets the cooldown of a specific item. (Does not operate on specific stacks).

Type ID: `apugli:item_cooldown`



---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Item Cooldown

---



[Entity Action Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/item_cooldown).

Sets the cooldown of a specific item. (Does not operate on specific stacks).

Type ID: `apugli:item_cooldown`



---

items.description: The type of items to add a cooldown to if it is present in the inventory.
items.markdownDescription: The type of items to add a cooldown to if it is present in the inventory.

item_tags.description: A tag of items to add a cooldown to if they are present in the inventory.
item_tags.markdownDescription: A tag of items to add a cooldown to if they are present in the inventory.

ticks.description: The amount of ticks that the cooldown should be active for.
ticks.markdownDescription: The amount of ticks that the cooldown should be active for.
